channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How to Use
item.description: hugo はインストール済みであると仮定して話を進める． hugo new site <the name of site> git submodule add https://github.com/MeiK2333/github-style.git themes/github-style cp -r ./themes/github-style/layouts/* ./layouts/ hugo new post/first-article.md edit config.toml hugo

item.title: First
item.description: 素の状態だと数式は使えない？ $ax + b = 0$ $$ \sum_{i=1}^{n} \frac{1}{i}$$
